content: अद्रिः [अद्-क्रिन् <ls>Uṇ. 4. 65</ls>; according to <ls>Nir.</ls> <ab>fr.</ab> दॄ to tear or अद् to eat.] {@--1@} A mountain. {@--2@} A stone, especially one for pounding Soma with or grinding it on. {@--3@} A thunderbolt (आदृणाति येन <ls>Nir.</ls>). {@--4@} A tree. {@--5@} The sun. {@--6@} A mass of clouds (probably so called from its resemblance to a mountain); a cloud (आदरयितव्यो भवति ह्यसौ उदकार्थं <ls>Nir.</ls>) mostly <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--7@} A kind of measure. {@--8@} The number {7}
